description: A resource schema representing a Lake Formation Tag.

CatalogIdString.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 12  
Maximum Length: 12  
Update requires: No interruption

LFTagKey.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^([{a-zA-Z}{\s}{0-9}_.:\/=+\-@%]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

LFTagValue.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^([{a-zA-Z}{\s}{0-9}_.:\*\/=+\-@%]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

TagValueList.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

CatalogId.description: The identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, the account ID. The Data Catalog is the persistent metadata store. It contains database definitions, table definitions, and other control information to manage your Lake Formation environment.
CatalogId.markdownDescription:
The identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, the account ID. The Data Catalog is the persistent metadata store. It contains database definitions, table definitions, and other control information to manage your Lake Formation environment.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: Replacement

TagKey.markdownDescription:
The key-name for the LF-tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type:   
Update requires: Replacement

TagValues.description: A list of possible values an attribute can take.
TagValues.markdownDescription:
A list of possible values an attribute can take.

---
